stories.title: Show HN: Distributed Tracing Using OpenTelemetry and ClickHouse

stories.text:
Writing is easy to the extent that you are interested in what you are writing about. Most of the challenges with writing stems from the *process of writing no the writing itself.* Typical challenges consist of the following * Figuring out what to write about * The stress of sitting down and typing a thousand words in to your computer * How good is this content for your target audience * Overcoming obstacles such as writer's block * And so on. These are some of the challenges. The goodnews is that *with the new improvements in technology such as artificial intelligence, writing today is so much more easy than it has ever been in history.

Artificially intelligent systems has made it incredibly easy as a content creator to manifest your creativity more fully without barriers. The former walls that the great writers of the past had to deal with has been overcome by AI.

The issue with these systems is that they are expensive and require significant investment.

There are others that are free and very easy to use. They can help you kickstarter your engines to start churning out content.

My personal favourite is ShareTXT, it has a collection of free, open source productivity apps created for content creators.

You can use it to get content ideas from an AI, discover what people are searching online, find out how easy it is for people to read your content and much more. And the great part is that, it is free to use, no sign ups, no app downloads everything that you need to succeed as a content creator all in one place.

Learn more about it here - https://sharetxt.live/about
stories.title: Create great content easily with a free AI writer by ShareTXT
